http://gameinfocenter.com/pc-games/system-requirements/Test-Drive-Ferrari-Racing-Legends.html

Test Drive: Ferrari Racing Legends System Requirements

Minimum system requirements

OS: Windows XP (SP3) / Vista (SP2)/ Windows 7
CPU: Core 2 Duo E4400 2.0GHz, Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 3600+
RAM: 2.0 GB
GPU: GeForce GT 520, Radeon HD 4650
HDD: 7 GB
DX: Version 9.0c

hmm, having trouble here... when i go to start a quick race, its crashing with UNHANDLED EXCEPTION. Also its not saving my controller settings. anyone else having any probs?  a quick google search shows plenty others with same issue. no apparent solution though... any help is appreciated! thanx...

big thx to both SKIDROW and EXTREMEZONE for giving us another great torrent =)

the game works perfectly, if u have problems like "UNHANDLED EXCEPTION..." just turn off your anti-virus software and reinstal the game =)
Thanks! Working 100% Win7 x64! No problems
